column1: #text=A large fire , that burned down homes and trees .
#text=I felt lucky that my home had survived , but the trees nearby had not .
#text=I had just returned from a trip to the nursery where I had picked out a couple of small fruit bearing saplings .
#text=One was cherry , the other was plum .
#text=Now they sit next to the car , along with a shovel .
#text=After some consideration , I pulled on my gloves and stepped out into the now barren area next to my house to dig two holes , approximately 20 feet apart .
#text=I wanted to give them room to grow , yet close enough to have company .
#text=I places each sapling into its hole , patting new earth around it in a mound .
#text=The I turned on the water hose , and gave them a good drink , tapping down the new earth with the shovel . ''
#text=`` Welcome home '' '' I thought , as I smiled .
